require.danielstjules/stringy: String manipulation library (patch releases allowed because the vendor is reliable)
require.fzaninotto/faker: Fake data generation library (patch releases allowed because the vendor is reliable)
require.ramsey/uuid: UUID generation library (patch releases allowed because the vendor is reliable)
require.symfony/templating: Templating library (loose version because reliable vendor)
require.symfony/yaml: YAML Parser (loose version because reliable vendor)
require.nikic/fast-route: Controller routing (loose version because reliable vendor)
require.moneyphp/money: Value object for money (exact version because maintainer is no longer Mathias)
require.mindplay/middleman: PSR-7/PSR-15 HTTP middleware dispatcher (exact version because unreleased software)
require.middlewares/fast-route: PSR-7/PSR-15 HTTP middleware for Nikic Fastroute (exact version because its 0.x version)
require.middlewares/request-handler: PSR-7/PSR-15 HTTP middleware required to make the Nikic Fastroute middleware work (exact version because its 0.x version)
require.zendframework/zend-diactoros: HTTP message library for processing HTTP requests on the server (patch releases allowed because the vendor is reliable)
